item.title: Code of conduct
item.description: This code of conduct is developed for the virtual Bioc Asia 2021 conference. For more details, see the Bioconductor Code of Conduct Social media policy Images and content from talks, workshops, and posters may be shared publicly through social media (Twitter, etc.). Videos will be released on the Youtube Bioconductor channel. Please, inform the organizing committee as soon as possible if you don’t wish your presentation material to be shared. The Bioconductor conference aims to provide a supportive, collegial, and harassment-free environment Bioconductor is dedicated to providing a supportive, collegial, and harassment-free conference experience for everyone, regardless of:

item.title: Schedule
item.description: Schedule The assignment of speakers to each frame is currently being prepared. Click or change the place name in the left of “Powered by team up” (in the lower-right corner) to set your time zone.

item.title: Submissions
item.description: Abstract submission A few days later you will find a link to the submission form here. Important dates September 3, 2021: Registration opens September 8, 2021: Call for abstracts opens September 30, 2021: Call for abstracts closes October 8, 2021: Notification of decision November 1-4, 2021: BioC Asia 2021 Submission types Birds-of-a-feather session 25 min talk, Free-format, organizer-lead interactive discussion session on a topic relevant to the Bioconductor community.
